meanings.definition: To show or offer something for others to see or consider.
meanings.sent1: She presented her artwork at the school exhibition.
meanings.sent2: The teacher presented the new lesson to the class.
meanings.sent3: The magician presented a disappearing act with a twist.
meanings.sent4: The idea was presented like a shining gem in a sea of dull rocks.
meanings.sent5: The evidence was presented in a clear and compelling manner.

meanings.definition: To formally introduce someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He presented his friend to the rest of the group.
meanings.sent2: The host presented the guest speaker at the event.
meanings.sent3: The robot presented itself with a bow and a wave.
meanings.sent4: The new product was presented as the solution to all problems.
meanings.sent5: The grand entrance presented the queen in all her regal glory.

meanings.definition: To give a gift or award to someone.
meanings.sent1: They presented him with a trophy for his achievements.
meanings.sent2: The company presented bonuses to its employees for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The birthday present presented a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The scholarship was presented as a golden opportunity for the student.
meanings.sent5: The medal was presented with great honor and respect.
